high_descs: Go to the left side of the wooden dresser with the white top on it, in front of you.
Pick up the pencil between the lamp and the statue, on the back of the dresser.
Turn left and walk around the left side of the dresser so that you are standing right beside the lamp.
Turn the lamp in front of you, on the dresser on.
Go forward and turn left to the door, then right to the white dresser.
Pick up the yellow pencil next to the gray statue.
Go to the left to the edge of the dresser facing the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the pencil from the desk and turn the lamp on.

high_descs: Walk forward and to your left to stand at the dresser.
Pick up the pencil to the left of the statue.
Move to the left end of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pencil under the lamp light.
